message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You could have had 50/50, now it's 60/40. Think carefully!
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'll give you a better deal this time!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. 80/20, take it or leave it!
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience. 90/10, take it or leave it!
You're trying to squeeze me dry, but I'll give you one more chance!
You're almost out of options, and I'm almost out of time. 95/5, don't make me regret this!
You're really trying to take advantage of me now, but I'll give you one more chance!
You're down to your last chance, and I'm not budging. 99/1, take it or leave it... for real this time!
I'd rather get nothing than accept such an unfair offer. You're not getting everything!
